title: BIT robotics and ai or PES EC ( electronic City )
content:
I’ve got a 20k rank in KCET and just finished the second round. I’ve been offered Robotics and AI at BIT, but if I wait for the extended round, I might get ECE at PES (EC campus).

I’m okay with any field as long as it has good job opportunities. I’ve heard that a lot of Electronics students end up in IT anyway, and their syllabus is pretty heavy, so it’s hard to keep up with computer-related stuff.I’m thinking about going into IT, but I’m not sure if Electronics-related jobs will get better in the next four years.

What do you think? Should I go with BIT or wait for PES?

comments.body:
placements at PES EC for ECE is dead 
about 5 get placed in 100, my seniors r suffering 
if ur interested join else dont even look 
and ECE aint easy btw its all on u and ur intrest bud
i am getting msrit ETE or pes Ecity ECE , i am confused now
